circumstances: While on a night approach to Jackson-Allen C. Thompson Airport in good weather conditions, both engines lost power and failed. The pilot lost control of the airplane that crashed few miles from the airfield. The pilot and four passengers were killed while a fifth passenger was seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Double engine failure on final approach caused by the following factors:
- Mismanagement of fuel, 
- Miscalculated fuel consumption, 
- Fuel exhaustion.
